name: abeqinbi
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1))
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cab(s0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cab(s0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Intersection with class abstraction and equivalent wff's. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 21-Jul-2021.)
